resources.string: Was the Eiffel Tower criticized by artists and writers when it was built?
Has the Roman Colosseum been used as a stage for theatrical performances?
Does the Great Wall of China have sections built with rice as part of the material?
Was Machu Picchu unknown to Spanish conquistadors?
Was the Statue of Liberty originally intended for Egypt?
Does the Taj Mahal change color according to the phases of the moon?
Has the Acropolis of Athens suffered significant damage due to pollution?
Has the Christ the Redeemer in Rio de Janeiro been struck by lightning several times?
Was the Palace of Versailles used as a seat of government during the French Revolution?
Does the Statue of Unity in India have an observation gallery inside?
